title.en: Kaibutsu-tachi wo Suberu Mono - Saikyou no Shien Tokka Nouryoku de, Kizukeba Sekai Saikyou Party ni!

altTitles.ja: 怪物たちを統べるモノ 最強の支援特化能力で、気付けば世界最強パーティーに！

altTitles.en: The Boy Who Rules the Monsters

description.en: Black Tiger is a party of five young prodigy adventurers hailed as the Miracle Children across the land. Yet, among them, Sol Rock stood apart from the rest. Branded as a worthless support mage and treated like a mere expendable grunt. One day, after completing their promotion quest, he was told he wasn’t strong enough to keep up and was kicked out. What they didn’t know was that Sol Rock possessed the greatest power of all: the “Player,” a godlike talent that allows him to buff his allies and dominate the battlefield. Now, cast out and alone, Sol Rock is determined to prove his worth. He sets out to gather the strongest group the world has ever seen!
description.ja:
『奇跡の子』が集った、新進気鋭の天才冒険者パーティー『黒虎』。偉業を成し遂げるそのパーティーで、ソル・ロックは『雑用』と揶揄され唯一頼りない支援術士と思われていた。５人で討伐を終えたある日ーーソルは『力不足』だと仲間に告げられ、そのままパーティーから追放されてしまう。

しかし…ソルの本当の能力『プレイヤー』は、『仲間』に強力なジョブやスキルを与え、超強化する神の如き最強の力だった！追放されたソルは、最強の支援特化能力で最強のパーティーを作り上げるべく動き出し…？

description.en: A comic about a bunch of foreign monsters contributing GDP in China.

altTitles.ja: 寄生列島

description.en: Sendo Chihiro, a high school girl, moves from Tokyo to the provincial island of Hanayama after her parents' divorce. There's something strange about the island she moves to. There is blatant discrimination against outsiders, mysterious rituals that suddenly take place, and a huge "water tower" built in the middle of the island... One day, a fisherman is stabbed to death in his home. The whole island becomes suspicious of the murderer, and the unexpected culprit is revealed...
description.ja: 離島「花山島」に東京からやってきた女子高生、千堂千尋。独自の風俗が残るその島で、人の欲望が暴走する事件が起き始める。殺人、放火、強姦…‥際限ない欲望が離島を地獄に変えていく――。

altTitles.ja: サキュバス奴隷との日常

altTitles.en: My Life with a Succubus Slave

altTitles.ja: ティラノ

description.en:
Sexual violence tag is for chapter 1 only.

The setting is the year 202X, in Kamata, Ota Ward, Tokyo, which has become one of the world's leading entertainment districts due to the opening of the Kamata Line. The area attracts huge economic benefits and is surrounded by organized crime, foreign mafias, terrorists, smugglers, prostitution rings... and the hidden agendas of political, financial, and governmental power players. A newly assigned police officer, Nonogami, stationed at the station's front police box, feels despair over the corruption of power. However, with the overwhelming violence of "Tyranno," a massive female police officer, the cases begin to be solved.
description.ja: 舞台は202X年、蒲蒲線の開通により世界有数の歓楽街となった東京大田区蒲田。 巨額の経済効果と利権に群がる反社会勢力・外国人マフィア・テロリスト、密売人、売春組織…そして政財官の黒幕の思惑…駅前の交番に赴任した新任警察官・野々上は権力の腐敗に絶望するが、「ティラノ」と呼ばれる巨躯の女性警官の圧倒的な暴力によって事件を解決していく。

title.en: Mata Korosarete Shimatta no desu ne, Tantei-sama

altTitles.ja: また殺されてしまったのですね、探偵様

description.en: High school student Sakuya Otsuki, whose father is a legendary detective, works as a half-baked detective alongside his beautiful and talented assistant Lilithea. However, due to Sakuya's "special constitution" and a request that comes in one day, they become embroiled in a major incident, and their fates change dramatically.
description.ja: 伝説の名探偵を父に持つ高校生・追月朔也は、助手の少女・リリテアと2人で探偵業に勤しんでいた。しかし、朔也に宿る“特殊体質”、そして一つの依頼が、彼らをやがて大きな事件に巻き込んでいく――。

title.en: Uchi ni Kaeru to Itsumo Kukkoro ga Iru

altTitles.ja: 家に帰るといつもくっころが居る

altTitles.id: Saat Pulang ke Rumah, Selalu Ada Kucing yang Ada di Sana.

description.en: A high school student planning to live alone decides to rent a "stigmatized property" where the ghost of a female knight appears!

title.en: Herami Shimai wa Docchi mo Yanderu

altTitles.ja: 平良深姉妹はどっちもヤんでる

altTitles.en: The Yandere Little Sister and the Menhera Big Sister

altTitles.es-la: La hermana pequeña yandere y la hermana mayor menhera

altTitles.zh: 平良深姐妹都“病”得不轻

altTitles.vi: Hai chị em nhà Herami bất ổn thực sự!

description.en: Sera, (Real Name: Herami Sera) is an approval-seeking girl (26 years old) who works at a maid café. Her younger sister, Kira, is an idol (19 years old) who is rapidly gaining popularity with her cool, and mature character. However, the real Kira only ever thinks of her sister and tries to cheer her up in every possible way to help her sister with her mental health and anxiety.
description.ja: せーら（本名：平良深 瀬良）はメイドカフェで働く承認欲求高めな女子（26歳）。そんな彼女の妹・キラは、クールな大人っぽいキャラで人気沸騰中のアイドル（19歳）。しかし、素顔のキラはいつも姉のことしか考えておらず、不安を抱える姉のため、あらゆる手段で励まそうとしていて…。
description.es-la: Sera, (Nombre real: Herami Sera) es una chica que busca aprobación (26 años) que trabaja en un maid café. Su hermana menor, Kira, es una ídolo (19 años) que está ganando popularidad rápidamente con su carácter frío y maduro. Sin embargo, la verdadera Kira solo piensa en su hermana y trata de animarla de todas las maneras posibles para ayudar a su hermana con su salud mental y ansiedad.

altTitles.ja: ゴーストフィクサーズ

description.en: Following a certain event, Mikurigaoka New Town transformed into a crucible of supernatural phenomena known as GHOSTS! In said town lives Hifumi, a middle school boy, who one day encounters a girl who just moved in... Help "correct" the supernatural in this action-packed tale from Yasuki Tanaka, creator of "Summer Time Rendering"!

title.en: A Mother's Love, a Daughter's Prison

altTitles.ja: 母という呪縛 娘という牢獄

altTitles.vi: Lời nguyền của mẹ - Ngục tù của con

altTitles.ja-ro: Haha to iu Jubaku Musume to iu Rougoku

description.en: The torso of a headless, limbless body is found half-buried by a riverbank. It belonged to middle-aged mother Yaeko Miyagawa, and after an investigation and trial, her daughter Hikari eventually confesses to her murder. For many years, Hikari had been subjected to physical and emotional abuse by her mother, revolving around her failure to make it into a top medical school and become a doctor. Even after nine years of futile applications and entrance exams, Yaeko refused to free her daughter from this virtual prison. What led to the fatal stabbing that ended Yaeko’s life? This series, based on a true story, will explore Hikari Miyagawa’s experiences up to her greatest tragedy—and what happened to her afterward.
description.vi:
Đây là một câu chuyện dựa trên sự việc có thật.
Một th... th... với đầu và tứ chi bị ch.t đ.ứ.t l.ì.a được phát hiện thấy bên bờ sông. Sau khi điều tra, cảnh sát đã xác minh danh tính nạn nhân là Miyagawa Yaeko, thế nhưng rúng động hơn, hung thủ gây ra vụ án dã man này không ai khác chính là Miyagawa Hikari, con gái của bị hại.
Được biết suốt thời gian qua, Miyagawa Hikari đã liên tục bị mẹ ép học hành quá mức, và đã thi trượt vào Đại học Y đến 9 lần. Thế nhưng, mẹ cô lại không hề có ý định dừng lại. Và rồi, chuyện gì đến cũng sẽ phải đến...

title.en: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden:  Kikuri Hiroi's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！外伝　廣井きくりの深酒日記

altTitles.en: Bocchi the Rock! Side Story: Hiroi Kikuri's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ru: Одинокий Рокер! Спин-офф: Дневник пьяницы Хирои Кикури

altTitles.vi: Bocchi the Rock! Ngoại Truyện: Nhật Ký Say Rượu của Hiroi Kikuri

altTitles.ja-ro: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden: Hiroi Kikuri no Fukazake Nikki

description.en:
25 years old Kikuri Hiroi is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK" and loves alcohol. 
She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment inside concert clubs, so she's often short of money. 
She lives in a 52-year-old bathless apartment so she borrows showers from her friends sometimes. 
Regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, she counters that with a alcohol-fueled "happiness spiral". 
What is her daily life like...?!

altTitles.ja: 聖母の断罪

altTitles.vi: Lời tuyên án của Đức Mẹ

description.ar: بعد وفاة ابنها بطريقة مروعة، تكتشف والدتهُ تنمر الآخرين الشديد عليه، فعقدت العزم على معاقبة أولئك المتنمرين الذين أخذوا ابنها الحبيب منها، وبدأت العمل كممرضة في المدرسة
description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ja: 親子3人で幸せな家庭を築いていた流（ながれ）一家。だが、息子の桐崇は学校でひそかに虐めにあっていた。そして起きてしまったある事件をきっかけに、息子を想う母の愛が暴走していく――。
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.

description.en: "Alma mater, home town, blood ties—they're all but a façade!" The war against organized crime waged by the government has failed miserably… And the world turned into a battlefield of mayhem ruled by one's fists. The one who unified this hell, Chairman of the Taejin Group, "Jin Young-ui," has decided to open a competition of man, "Festival of Warriors" in search for a successor. Will our unemployed thug "Kang Dae-oh" rise to the top of the pyramid?!

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal~〈Fan Colored〉

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

description.en: Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

title.en: Confessing My Love to Him, the Treacherous One

description.en: When Natalie went back in time after her death, her only desire was for revenge. Instead, she accidentally confessed to the most dangerous man in the empire?! Natalie, the only daughter of the Count, was tricked by her stepmother and stepsister into marrying an abusive scumbag before dying tragically. After going back in time, she decided to turn her back against them and prepared to interfere with her stepsister’s love for the young master of the Duke’s mansion, Eli. But what she didn’t expect was for an accident to occur, and she ended up confessing to his uncle instead?! Help, this man is notorious for being difficult to deal with! Is it too late now to withdraw the confession?

altTitles.ja: 私のアリカ

description.en: A huge incident happens to Arika, the center of a hugely popular idol group. Is the culprit a fan? Or could it be... The light and dark sides of the glamorous idol industry are now exposed!
description.ja: 人気急上昇中のアイドルグループのセンター・アリカの身に起きた大事件。犯人はファンか、それとも‥‥。華々しいアイドル業界の光と闇が今暴かれる！
description.vi:
Mamiya Arika, nữ hát chính của nhóm nhạc thần tượng "Lyrical Trick" bỗng mất tích một cách bí ẩn. Và đầu mối duy nhất về dấu vết của cô chỉ đơn giản là một đoạn video camera an ninh.
Liệu đây có đơn giản chỉ là hành vi của một fan hâm mộ quá khích, một idol otaku hay không...!?

description.en: Yeren, who dreams of being a vampire hunter, is unwittingly caught in the crossfire between a vampire girl and the Holy lands. As a temporary blood servant, he doesn't know what to do when the hatred and strife between them have been ongoing for thousands of years… This is a story about Lilo·Ai, the last vampire.

altTitles.ja: シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…
description.pt-br: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada “Shy”...

title.en: Ninja Slayer: Kyoto, Hell on Earth

altTitles.ja: ニンジャスレイヤー・キョート・ヘル・オン・アース

altTitles.zh: 忍者杀手 杀伐都市京都

altTitles.ru: Ниндзя Слеер: Киото - ад на земле

description.en: The man who annihilated the Soukaiya, the enemy of his wife and child, and buried Neo-Saitama in flames has appeared in Gaion City, Kyoto Republic! Ninja Slayer's new battle begins to eradicate his other enemy, the Zaibatsu!
description.ja: 妻子の仇、ソウカイヤを壊滅、ネオサイタマを炎に埋めた男がキョート共和国、ガイオンシティに現れた!　もう一つの仇、ザイバツを根絶すべく、ニンジャスレイヤーの新たなイクサが始まる!!
description.zh:
击破了总会屋的忍者杀手，藤木户·健二，接下来开始朝着另一个仇人罪罚所在的京都进发
助他最终战胜老元·宽的奈落·忍者，在战斗的最后为了保护藤木户的身体而陷入沉眠，接下来的敌人京都罪罚的恐怖威势更是远超预想……
初来乍到的藤木户只在前往京都的路上都要经过连场大战，孤立无援的他究竟要如何才能坚持到最后，为妻儿的复仇画上句号？
在历史名都祇园，忍者杀手Vs忍者的激战在此拉开帷幕！

description.en: Official Hetalia AU. "This world, although similar to the one we know of, is just slightly different. Data-wise, it's pretty much the same thing, just a lot more punk and grunge-like this time. 200 crowded districts, each with a unique culture and history of their own, each with a boss in charge, in a spinning circle of harmony and chaos. Yet a new disruption was about to arise."

title.en: Kusuriya no Hitorigoto ~Maomao no Koukyuu Nazotoki Techou~

altTitles.en: The Apothecary Diaries: Maomao's Notes from the Inner Palace
The Apothecary Diaries: Maomao's Inner Palace Notebook of Mysteries

altTitles.ru: Монолог в аптечной лавке - Журнал тайн внутреннего дворца Маомао

altTitles.ja: 薬屋のひとりごと～猫猫の後宮謎解き手帳～

description.en:
In the imperial court, a young woman is put into servitude, Maomao. The tale is just beginning for the female apothecary from the red-light district, as rumors circulate about the emperor's children's lives being short-lived. Her curious nature and thirst for knowledge pushes her to action. To satisfy her curiosity, this young apothecary  will investigate the origin! What is shifting in the imperial court..!?  
  


---
description.ja: 誘拐された挙句、とある大国の後宮に売り飛ばされた薬屋の少女・猫猫（マオマオ）。年季が明けるまで大人しくしようと決めていた猫猫だったが、あるとき皇帝の子どもたちが次々と不審死することを知る。好奇心と少しばかりの正義心、そして薬屋の知識を使い、その謎を調べ始めてから猫猫の運命は大きく変わって…？
description.ru: В императорский двор была доставлена молодая девушка Маомао. История её берёт начало в районе красных фонарей, где начали ходить слухи о том, что жизни детей императора под угрозой. Ею движут любопытство и жажда знаний. Чтобы удовлетворить своё любопытство, молодая целительница будет докапываться до истины! Что же изменится при императорском дворе?!
description.pt-br: Na corte imperial, uma jovem é colocada em servidão, Maomao. A história está apenas começando para a médica/apotecária do distrito da luz vermelha, enquanto circulam rumores de que a vida dos filhos do imperador foi de curta duração. Sua natureza curiosa e sede de conhecimento a levam à ação. Para satisfazer a sua curiosidade, esta jovem médica/apotecária irá investigar a origem! O que está mudando na corte imperial..!?

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?

altTitles.de: Meine neue Freundin ist kein Mensch?

altTitles.fr: Ma Nouvelle Copine N'est Pas Humaine ?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha nova namorada não é humana?

altTitles.tr: Yeni kız arkadaşım insan değil mi?

altTitles.pl: Moja nowa dziewczyna nie jest człowiekiem?

title.en: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Kinden - Kamigami no Apocalypse

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ禁伝 神々の黙示録

altTitles.en: Record of Ragnarok Forbidden Side-Story: Gods' Apocalypse
Record of Ragnarok: The Apocalypse of the Gods

description.en: Zeus, supreme chairman of the Council of Valhalla, announces to the gods twelve of the thirteen fighters set to participate in Ragnarok--and is met with the dissenting voices of those who were not chosen. However, Zeus has foreseen this, and immediately declares the holding of another tournament to decide the final spot on the Ragnarok lineup, one which will break the taboo on gods fighting one another. Thus begins the "Revelation" of the untold side of *Record of Ragnarok!*

altTitles.ja: スーパーボールガールズ

description.en: Ichiyoshi continues to work at a chocolate factory, locking away his "best" in his heart. One Christmas night, on his way home, he finds a mysterious superball that rolls out of the darkness...
description.ja: 人生で自分にとっての「一番」をずっと心にしまい続けながら、チョコレート工場での仕事を続ける一好瑛太。クリスマスの夜、帰宅中の彼は暗闇から転がる不思議なスーパーボールを手にする。日常への様々な思いをぶつけるように、そのボールを思い切り投げつけた彼の前にいきなり現れたのは理想の「美女」．．．！？
description.pt-br: Ichiyoshi continua trabalhando em uma fábrica de chocolate, trancando o seu "melhor" em seu coração. Numa noite de Natal, a caminho de casa, ele encontra uma misteriosa super bola que  cai da escuridão...

altTitles.ja: デビィ・ザ・コルシファは負けず嫌い

description.en:
*"I know! I'll destroy some humans to kill time!"*   
  
The strongest demon ever makes an unexpected appearance! But she's… a total airhead?! A comedy about a clumsy but emulous demon trying to kill time begins!
description.es:
"¡Lo sé! ¡Destruiré a algunos humanos para matar el tiempo!"

¡El demonio más fuerte de todos los tiempos hace una aparición inesperada! Pero es... ¡una cabeza hueca total! ¡Comienza una comedia sobre un demonio torpe pero émulo que intenta matar el tiempo!
description.ja: 「暇つぶしに人間でも滅ぼすかのう！」突如として現れた、史上最強の悪魔！でもコイツ...チョロすぎ!?ポンコツだけど負けず嫌いな悪魔と繰り広げる暇つぶしコメディー、開幕!!
description.ru: Однажды в комнату Рокуро неожиданно заявился сильнейший в мире демон! Но постойте, что же это... Неужто она настолько пустоголовая!? Встречайте великолепную комедийную историю о неуклюжем демоне, пытающимся скоротать время за людскими играми!
description.es-la:
"¡Lo sé! ¡Destruiré a algunos humanos para matar el tiempo!"

¡El demonio más fuerte de todos los tiempos hace una aparición inesperada! Pero es... ¡una cabeza hueca total! ¡Comienza una comedia sobre un demonio torpe pero émulo que intenta matar el tiempo!

title.en: My Friend's Little Sister Has It in for Me!

altTitles.en: My Friend's Little Sister is Annoying Only Towards Me

altTitles.id: Adik Perempuan Temanku Hanya Usil Kepadaku

altTitles.en: My Friend's Little Sister is Only Annoying to Me

altTitles.ru: Младшая сестрёнка моего друга пристает лишь ко мне

altTitles.ja: 友達の妹が俺にだけウザい

altTitles.ja-ro: Tomodachi no Imouto ga Ore ni Dake Uzai

altTitles.es-la: La hermana menor de mi mejor amigo solo es molesta conmigo

description.en:
I don’t need any deep relationships. I have no desire for a girlfriend, and I only require one friend who holds any value to me. Ever since I threw out my youth for the sake of efficiency, there is one person who keeps entering the bedroom of Ooboshi Akiteru. She’s neither my little sister nor my friend. She’s nothing more than a bothersome, annoying Kouhai, as well as my friend’s little sister: Kohinata Iroha. “Senpai, let’s go on a date~! Did you think I’d say that~?”. Rather than blood, it seems that energy drinks run through her veins. She keeps occupying my bed, and she tries her best to seduce me with whatever method she can play to her favor. She’s a girl who’s constantly annoying and obnoxious around me. Even though I’m busy all day long, she doesn’t care. And in case you’re wondering why all these envious gazes are directed at me, it’s because Iroha is actually really popular. She’s an honor student at our school with top grades to boot, and she’s known for being kind and proper to anyone she meets. …Hey now, why are you only so annoying when you’re around me?  

---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/imouza_PR)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Author’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/mikawaghost)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Manga Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/hiraminmi)  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://ga.sbcr.jp/sp/imouza/)  
- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/s/my-friend-s-little-sister-has-it-in-for-me)  
- [Alternative Raw](https://www.ganganonline.com/contents/tomodachino)
description.pt: Não preciso de nenhum relacionamento profundo. Não desejo uma namorada, e só preciso de um amigo que tenha algum valor para mim. Desde que eu, Ooboshi Akiteru, joguei fora minha juventude por uma questão de eficiência, há uma pessoa que continua entrando no meu quarto. Ela não é minha irmãzinha nem minha amiga. Ela não passa de uma Kouhai chata e irritante, além da irmã mais nova do meu amigo: Kohinata Iroha. "Senpai, vamos a um encontro ~! Você achou que eu diria isso ~?". Em vez de sangue, parece que bebidas energéticas correm por suas veias. Ela continua ocupando minha cama e tenta ao máximo me seduzir com qualquer método que ela possa jogar a seu favor. Ela é uma garota que é constantemente irritante e desagradável ao meu redor. Embora eu esteja ocupada o dia todo, ela não se importa. E caso você esteja se perguntando por que todos esses olhares invejosos são direcionados para mim, é porque Iroha é realmente muito popular. Ela é uma aluna de honra da nossa escola com as melhores notas e é conhecida por ser gentil e adequada com qualquer pessoa que conhece. …Ei agora, por que você é tão irritante quando está perto de mim?
description.ru: Мне не нужны никакие глубокие отношения. У меня нет желания иметь подругу, и мне нужен только один друг, который имеет для меня хоть какую-то ценность. С тех пор как я бросил свою молодость ради эффективности, есть один человек, который продолжает входить в спальню Ообоши Акитеру. Она мне не младшая сестра и не подруга. Она не более чем надоедливый, раздражающий кохай, а также младшая сестра моего друга: Кохината Ироха. "Сэмпай, давай сходим на свидание! Неужели ты думал, что я так скажу?”. Кажется, что по ее венам текут не кровь, а энергетические напитки. Она по-прежнему занимает мою постель и изо всех сил старается соблазнить меня любым способом, который может сыграть ей на руку. Она - девушка, которая постоянно раздражает и раздражает меня. Хотя я весь день занят, ей все равно. И если вам интересно, почему все эти завистливые взгляды направлены на меня, это потому, что Ироха действительно очень популярна. Она почетная ученица в нашей школе с высшими оценками в придачу, и она известна своей добротой и порядочностью ко всем, кого она встречает. "Эй, почему ты так раздражаешь меня, только когда рядом со мной?"
description.es-la: No necesito una relación profunda. No tengo deseo por una novia, y solo requiero un amigo que tenga algún valor para mí. Desde que deseche mi juventud a favor de la eficiencia, hay una persona que sigue entrando al dormitorio de Ooboshi Akiteru. Ella no es mi hermanita o mi amiga. Ella no es nada más que una molestia, una molesta kouhai, así como la hermana pequeña de mi amigo: Kohinata Iroha. "¡Senpai, tengamos una cita! ¿Creíste que diría eso?" En vez de sangre, pareciera que una bebida energética corriera por sus venas. ella sigue ocupando mi cama, y ella da su mejor esfuerzo para seducirme con cualquier método que pueda usar a su favor. ella es una chica que es constantemente molesta y desagradable a mi alrededor. incluso si estoy ocupado todo el día, a ella no le importa. Y en caso de que te estés preguntando por que todas esas miradas envidiosas están dirigidas a mí, es porque Iroha es realmente popular. Ella es una estudiante de honor en nuestra escuela con las mejores calificaciones, y ella es conocida por ser amable y apropiada para cualquiera que ella conozca. Hey ahora, ¿Porque solo eres escandalosa cuando estas alrededor mío?

title.en: Giri no Kyoudai Dakedo Koibito no Futari wa Doudou to Tsukiaitai

altTitles.ja: 義理の兄弟だけど恋人のふたりは堂々と付き合いたい

altTitles.en: Stepbrothers Are Dating and Want to Be Open About It

description.en:
Kazuma and Yuuya are stepbrothers who are actually lovers and live under one roof (in their parents' house), secretly doing the things lovers do under their parents' radar.

A particular close call is intercepted by Kazuma's quick-thinking. While Yuuya is determined to keep their relationship under wraps, he also begins to feel anxious and conflicted for how long they can keep it a secret.

On the other hand, Kazuma meets Yuuya's student, Matsubara, from his part-time as a cram school tutor by chance when they're out shopping. Seeing their closeness, Kazuma's instincts tells him that he should keep an eye out for him.
He is also curious how Yuuya is doing at the cram school, with Yuuya having a charm that attracts those younger than him...

A possessive younger brother who loves his brother x A popular, soft-type older brother
The two face the feelings they can't hide for each other...

title.en: Tensei Kizoku, Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi o Uketsuida node, Yuushuu na Jinzai o Fuyashiteitara, Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~

altTitles.ja: 転生貴族、鑑定スキルで成り上がる～弱小領地を受け継いだので、優秀な人材を増やしていたら、最強領地になってた～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Kizoku Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi wo Uketsuidanode, Yuushuuna Jinzai wo Fuyashite Itara, Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~

altTitles.en: As a Reincarnated Aristocrat, I'll Use My Appraisal Skill to Rise in the World: I Inherited a Weak Territory, and If I Increase the Number of Capable Personnel, It Will Become the Strongest Territory

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生貴族，以鑑定技能成名～因為繼承了弱小的領地，所以如果增加了優秀的人才，就會成為最強的領地～

altTitles.id: Terlahir kembali menjadi seorang bangsawan dengan skill penilaian
Seorang bangsawan yang bereinkarnasi, bangkit dengan kemampuan analisis

altTitles.pt-br: Como um Aristocrata Reencarnado, Usarei Minha Habilidade de Avaliação para Subir no Mundo

altTitles.vi: Quý Tộc Tái Sinh Thăng Tiến Nhờ Kỹ Năng Thẩm Định: Vì Thừa Kế Một Lãnh Địa Nhỏ Yếu, Nên Khi Tuyển Dụng Người Tài, Đã Trở Thành Lãnh Địa Mạnh Nhất
Tái Sinh Thành Quý Tộc Với Kĩ Năng "Thẩm Định"

description.en: After being reincarnated, Ars Louvent is supposed to live in a different world as a weak aristocrat. Both his physical strength and intelligence were mediocre in both worlds, but here he naturally possessed a skill called "Appraisal" that allowed him to see the potential of any person. By gathering talented people by his side, Ars uses this "Appraisal" skill to transform his weak territory into the strongest one! But the road ahead of him won't be so simple.
description.ja: 転生し、弱小貴族として異世界を生きることになったアルス・ローベント。現代同様、異世界でも体力・知力ともに平凡だったが、“鑑定スキル”という人の潜在能力を知ることが出来るスキルを生まれつき所持していた。アルスは自分の民たちを守るため、“鑑定スキル”で弱小領地を最強の領地へと変貌させていく───！
description.vi: Sau khi được tái sinh, Ars Louvent được cho là một quý tộc yếu kém. Cả sức mạnh thể chất và trí tuệ của cậu đều ở mức trung bình ở cả 2 thế giới. Nhưng cậu sở hữu một kĩ năng độc nhất có tên ' Thẩm định' cho phép cậu có thể nhìn được chỉ số và tiềm năng của mọi người. Bằng cách tập hợp những người tài năng về bên cạnh, Ars sẽ sử dụng kĩ năng 'Thẩm định' này để khiến lãnh thổ yếu ớt của mình thành nơi mạnh nhất! Nhưng con đường phía trước của cậu sẽ không hề dễ dàng.
description.pt-br: Após ser reencarnado, Ars Louvent deve viver em um mundo diferente como um aristocrata fraco. Tanto sua força física quanto sua inteligência eram medíocres em ambos os mundos, mas aqui ele naturalmente possuía uma habilidade chamada “Avaliação” que lhe permitia ver o potencial de qualquer pessoa. Ao reunir pessoas talentosas ao seu lado, Ars usa esta habilidade de “Avaliação” para transformar seu território fraco no mais forte! Mas o caminho à sua frente não será tão simples.

title.en: Power-Hara Genkai Yuusha, Maougun kara Koutaiguu de Scout sareru ~Yuusha Ranking 1-i na no ni Tedori ga Gomi sugite Seikatsu Dekimasen~

altTitles.ja: パワハラ限界勇者、魔王軍から好待遇でスカウトされる～勇者ランキング１位なのに手取りがゴミ過ぎて生活できません～

description.en:
In this modern age, there are many heroes and demon lords. There was a hero who ranked first in the hero rankings and had the title of "Strongest''. His name is Hero Allen. The strongest hero, who is recognized by everyone, has gained status and honor, and his life is in easy mode...

"That never happened!"

Orders to subjugate the Demon King are issued without a break. Even if you go to great lengths to subjugate a brutal demon lord, you will only receive an amount that even an average man can easily earn, excluding miscellaneous expenses. All expeditions are at my own expense. It's not very bad, but I can't live with it. He then confronts the demon king of destiny. The beautiful female demon lord made a proposal to the dissatisfied hero.

"Hero! Get hired on these conditions!"

The conditions were so favorable, that I was moved.
description.ja:
無数の勇者と魔王が存在する世界で、『最強』の称号を持つ勇者アレン。だが彼は、悩んでいた…
・絶え間ない魔王討伐命令
・王様からのパワハラ
・見合わない報酬

もう、我慢の限界!!

そんな金欠勇者に魔王から救いの手が!? 超好待遇のスカウトにアレンの選択は――

altTitles.ja: 天使とアクト！！

description.en:
Ikurumi Akuto is the top of his class in every subject, including sports, and he knows it. The son of a well-known politician, a degree of arrogance is to be expected. But Akuto takes it to a new extreme with his condescending and self-important attitude. It doesn't help matters that his effeminate voice makes him a target of constant ridicule by his "lower class" schoolmates.  
  
Then Harusaka Nari enters his life, and Akuto's controlling personality is thrown off kilter by the optimistic but manipulating young seiyuu. With his life on the line, he agrees to be a voice in her Anime Research Society's project for the upcoming Cultural Festival... as the female lead?!
description.ja: 政治家を父に持ち、スポーツ万能、成績優秀、非の打ち所のない孤高の天才、凰生為人。が、そんな彼にも欠点が！

title.en: The Grown Dog Bullies Its Owner

altTitles.th: เจ้าสุนัขตัวโตรังแกเจ้านายอีกแล้ว

description.en:
[Black-bellied top student x Two-faced school grass]
"You there, be mine!"

School grass Xia Zhixing, unwilling to reveal his identity as a streamer, borrows the face of the mysterious top student Lin Lang.

Unexpectedly, the student that resembled a cute little puppy had actually desired him for a long time...

"Senior, the reward I want is you."

His beloved crush was snatched up by the nerdy new student.  Furious, Ren Zhichu tries to harass that nerd at every chance he gets. Unexpectedly, during their interactions with each other, Ren Zhichu actually develops feelings for that nerd...

altTitles.ja: Haisu Koa Gaaru Dasshu
Hi Score Girl DASH
ハイスコアガールDASH

description.en: The manga will focus on the character Koharu Hidaka, who is a middle school teacher close to 30 years old in 2007.
description.es-la: Año 2007, Hidaka Koharu ahora es maestra de secundaria y a punto de alcanzar los 30 años. Sin novio y sin perspectivas para el futuro. Balanceándose entre el trabajo y la búsqueda de matrimonio, el corazón de esta chica madura es como un Kikouken.

title.en: Isekai NTR ~Shinyuu no Onna wo Saikyou Skill de Otosu Houhou~

altTitles.ja: 異世界NTR～親友のオンナを最強スキルで堕とす方法～

altTitles.th: ISEKAI NTR ~สร้างฮาเร็มโดยไม่ให้พรรคพวกรู้~

altTitles.ko: 이세계 NTR ~절친의 여자를 최강 스킬로 함락시키는 방법~

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界NTR ～不被同伴發現地開後宮～
異世界NTR～用最強技能令摯友的女人墜落的方法～

altTitles.en: Isekai NTR: Sullying My Best Friend's Women With the Strongest Skill
NTR in Another World: Sullying My Best Friend's Women With the Strongest Skill

description.en:
This shitty world that's nothing but a trashy game, he and I will definitely escape it together. So, all these annoying women trying to take advantage of him are just a nuisance. What's worse, it seems like he's beginning to have some feelings for them.

That's why, for his sake, I'll eat them up first. But, just what is this power…?
description.es: Este mundo de mierda que no es más que un juego basura, él y yo definitivamente escaparemos juntos. Entonces, todas estas mujeres molestas que intentan aprovecharse de él son solo una molestia. Lo que es peor, él parece que está comenzando a sentir algo por ellas. Por eso, por su bien, las comeré primero. Pero, ¿qué es este poder…?

altTitles.ja: オオカミどものしつけ方

description.en:
Origawa Industry Public High School is a school filled with rough men. There's only one girl in this high school packed with wolves. But this little sheep isn't an ordinary person!  
  
Also includes the following short story:  
Konna watashi ja nashi desu ka?!

Two childhood friends—Black, an emotional fashion designer with selective amnesia, and White, a rational writer who’s been absent for two years—reunite to confront their traumatic pasts and navigate the fragile space between heart and mind as they struggle to preserve their friendship on the brink of adulthood.
Grey is... is a deeply emotional coming-of-age series about the messy journey of self-discovery, about friendship, and about the delicate balance between emotion and reason.

altTitles.ja: エクセル♥サーガ
エクセル・サーガ

description.en:
When discussing conquest, Il Palazzo's motto would most likely be "start small." ACROSS, a group devoted to carrying out and accomplishing the ideals of absent-minded yet bishounen Il Palazzo, feels that the first step in conquering the entire planet would be conquering a single city. This city just so happens to be Fukuoka, where our story takes place.
___
**Official English (Digital):** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/excel-saga)

altTitles.ja: アイドル×アイドル　ストーリー！

description.en:
Mimi Nagisa (22 years old) is a former idol. After giving up on her dream of being an idol because of her lacking talent she spends her days working part-time while attending college. However, the moment she meets the idol Ibuki Nanakusa, whom she recently found interest in, their lives begin to cross each other.

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)
___
* [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/idol2story_info)
description.ja: 才能がないと夢を諦めた元アイドルのミミと、ミミに憧れていた現役アイドル・イブキ。そんな2人が、ひょんな出会いから一緒にサバイバルオーディション番組への出演を目指すことに…!?　一度は諦めかけた夢、今度こそ2人でなら…！
description.ru: Мими Нагиса (22 года) — бывший айдол. После того, как она отказалась от своей мечты стать айдолом из-за отсутствия таланта, она проводит дни работая на неполный рабочий день, учась в колледже. Однако в тот момент, когда она встречает кумира Ибуки Нанакуса, к которому она недавно проявляла интерес, их жизни начинают пересекаться.

altTitles.ja: コハエースこれくしょん
コハこれ

description.en:
We're ready to activate Super Dogeza toward basically everybody!

A collection of works by the popular manga artist of Koha-Ace, Keikenchi, has finally arrived. Included in this volume are the ultra-rare collaborations with Prisma Illya, Kantai Collection and Lucky☆Star! It's a volume that's sure to get you hooked on the world of Keikenchi! (Koha-Ace side-story collection, released between Koha-Ace EX and Koha-Ace XP)

altTitles.th: ชายเลวหมื่นลี้ทานตะวัน

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロイン救済計画

description.en:
Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."
description.fr:
Su Lüxia fait partie d'un "Système de rôle féminin".
Sa mission : en se téléportant dans les corps des femmes trompées et bafouées, elle renverse leur destinée.
"Seules les larmes d'un bâtard de tricheur et les gémissements de douleur d'une garce m'apportent le réconfort."
description.it:
Schiacciare un verme per un solo momento dà una soddisfazione momentanea, ma le vite passate a schiacciare i vermi forniscono vite di soddisfazione continua. Su Lüxia, la nostra protagonista femminile, trasmigra in altri mondi con il sistema di contrattacco della seconda protagonista femminile; usa schemi e trucchi elaborati per picchiare innumerevoli bastardi traditori e puttane.

Su Lüxia: "Solo le lacrime di rimorso di un bastardo traditore, e i gemiti di dolore di una puttana incapace di ottenere ciò che vuole, mi danno conforto."

Sistema: "Il mio ospite ha attinto alla sua umanità oggi? No."

altTitles.ja: ホーリーナイト

description.en: Mizumura Shinta didn’t know what to make of the situation when the sexiest girl in school, Kishimoto Ririsu, starts seducing him and things get extremely physical. Shinta isn’t rich or the popular guy in school so it doesn’t make sense that Ririsu would be so interested in him. But Ririsu is in fact a vampire, a secret that she will kill to keep hidden. As the relationship between Shinta and Ririsu grows, it gets harder for her to keep the secret hidden. And when those close to him, like his semi-romantic childhood friend Makimura Chizuru, are involuntarily thrown into the chaos, deep dark secrets get revealed.
description.ja: 「中出しのセッ●スって…超気持ちイイんだよ？」童貞の俺がハーフの女の子から、いきなり中出しを強要され!?　東京の某ミッション系短大に通う主人公の心太は、平穏且つ平凡な毎日を過ごしていた。そんなある日、学園に転入してきた謎のハーフ美少女リリスとの出会いにより彼の生活は大きく変化する…。理由もわからぬまま、突然リリスから濃厚なキスをされ、熱くなった股間を強く上下に動かされ…。「私が妊娠しちゃうくらい…キミの精子、たっぷり注ぎ込んで…？」心太を誘惑するリリスの本当の思惑とは…。

description.en:
Rai Genji always dreamed of becoming a world-class professional football player, especially one to play for the Japanese team. And by the efforts of his passion, he was invited to the Blue Lock project, where he developed his ego. Coming across foes, rivals, teammates, and friends; Rai learns time and time again that he needs to learn and improve beyond anything he thought was possible to survive. Will he be able to conquer the Blue Lock? Or will he be doomed by the very people he stands with?

Blue Lock Legions is a Blue Lock spin-off created for the purpose of pure enjoyment and not profit. The series follows very similar concepts to the original Blue Lock series, but with an original twist on the characters, plot line, events, etc.

Blue Lock Legions stands independently from the original Blue Lock Manga, and is posted on Mangadex without any involvement in the websites views, beliefs, practices, or problematic norms. It is simply here as the website provides a proper layout for the series to be viewed.

altTitles.ja: I have a younger sister. Her name is Rika.
リカ

description.en: It's about a boy named Nishizawa Kazuya who is in 2nd year of middle school. Unlike his younger sister, Rika, he is good at a lot of thing and is the fastest runner in the school. Parents and others think he is responsible and hard working child. It seems that he is perfect good child but he has a secret that he can't tell anyone. Every day he enjoys taking a peek at his sister, undressing herself.

altTitles.ja: カードファイト！！ ヴァンガード YouthQuake

description.en:
"I Think it's time for me to stop...playing Vanguard." "You've Got to Grow out of this Kid's Game."
Sentatsu Meguru, a first-year high school student, was wondering whether or not to continue playing Vanguard when his childhood friends and classmates are starting to quit.
One day, the master of his favorite café takes him to a fight with his grandfather,Kuranaga Sanzou.
Through the fight, Sanzou asks him a question, which leads him to look into his own mind, and is naturally led to the answer.
"I love it so much, there's no way I can stop!"
Then, he awoke to a strange power that allowed him to see the unit and the light that was connected to it on the board.
Quake your Soul!! A new story that Leads you to Vanguard!

altTitles.ja: ケロケロちゃいむ

description.en: Mimori is the princess of the frog kingdom, a fantastical place populated by the human frog tribe and, well … frogs. One day a young boy named Aoi shows up on the borders of the kingdom, claiming that Mimori's elder brother Makaeru cast a spell on him that causes him to transform into a frog when splashed with water. Together, Mimori and Aoi set out on a journey to find a spell to cure him. (And things only get weirder from here on out.)

title.en: From a Knight to a Lady

altTitles.vi: Cách mà người Hiệp Sĩ đó sống như một Tiểu Thư

altTitles.en: How that knight lives as a lady
The Way That Knight Lives as a Lady

altTitles.es: La Forma en que el Caballero Vive Como una Dama

description.en:
The sword of my closest friend and trusted adjutant pierced my body. When I opened my eyes again, I had become a noble lady of the enemy kingdom. In an unfamiliar and weak stranger’s body, three year’s time was lost, in which my homeland was brought to ruin. I was unable to come to my senses because of the pain of betrayal and confusion of my identity. However, eventually I decided to live on as 'Luciphella Aidine', a noble who wields a sword.  


---
description.es: La espada de mi amigo más cercano y ayudante de confianza atravesó mi cuerpo. Cuando volví a abrir los ojos, me había convertido en una noble dama del reino enemigo. En el cuerpo de un extraño desconocido y débil, se perdieron tres años en los que mi patria fue arruinada. No pude recuperar el sentido debido al dolor de la traición y la confusión de mi identidad. Sin embargo, finalmente decidí seguir viviendo como 'Luciphella Aidine', una noble que empuña una espada.
description.ru:
Рыцарь Эстель стала жертвой предательства и погибла ещё до финального сражения. От руки своего друга. Вот только попала она в свой личный ад. С войны на бал! В тело леди Люцифелии, невесты своего врага. Теперь её убийца постоянно находится рядом с ней. Полководец вражеской армии её жених, а она, смелый и благородный рыцарь, стала хрупкой леди, что и меча в руках не держала.  
Как выжить, не запутавшись в дворцовых интригах и светской жизни? Как затуманить разум своего врага, чтобы он ни о чём не догадался? И как тут найти любовь?
description.vi:
Thanh gươm của bạn thân và cũng là phụ tá đáng tin tưởng của tôi xuyên qua cơ thể của tôi.  
  
Khi mà tôi mở mắt ra, tôi đã trở thành một tiểu thư của một nhà quý tộc của phe địch của Vương quốc. Trong một cơ thể yếu đuối của một người lạ, ba năm đã trôi qua trong thời gian đó, đất mẹ của tôi đã bị hủy diệt. Tôi không thể hiểu được bất cứ chuyện gì vì nỗi đau của sự phản bội và sự hoang mang về danh tính của tôi.  
  
Thế nhưng, tôi đã quyết định sẽ sống như 'Luciphella Aidine', một quý tộc cầm một thanh kiếm.  


---

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

altTitles.ja: やんちゃギャルの安城さん

altTitles.th: คุณอันโจ หยอกนักเพราะรักนะ

description.de:
Seto ist ein total normaler und irgendwie langweiliger Schüler. Aus einem unerklärlichen Grund jedoch, lässt seine Mitschülerin Anjou ihn nicht in Ruhe! Der ernste Seto und die energische Anjou bilden ein kontrastreiches Duo, doch Anjou macht das nichts aus, da sie sehr viel Spaß hat, Seto zu necken. Andererseits hat Seto eine schwere Zeit mit Anjous Eskapaden. Wenn er doch nur wüsste, dass seine Reaktionen der Grund sind, dass Anjou weitermacht.  
  
Doch … ist ihr flirten wirklich nur gespielt …?
description.en:
Seto is a completely ordinary and somewhat boring high school student. Yet, for whatever reason, his errant gyaru classmate Anjou just won't leave him alone! The serious Seto and energetic Anjou make a contrasting duo, but Anjou doesn't seem to mind, as she has too much fun teasing him. On the other hand, Seto has a hard time dealing with all of her endless antics; little does he realize that his humorous reactions are precisely the reason Anjou enjoys his company.

But… just how much of her flirting is merely an act?

**Official English:** [emaqi - USA & Canada only](https://emaqi.com/manga/anjo-the-mischievous-gal)
description.fr: Seto est un lycéen ne souhaitant qu'une chose : passer sa scolarité sans être remarqué et être en paix. Malheureusement pour lui, il attire l'attention de la pire personne possible dans sa classe, Anjou la gal. A partir de ce jour, le quotidien de Seto va drastiquement changer grâce (ou à cause) de sa camarade, cherchant à s'amuser au dépend de notre héros.
description.ja: 真面目でクラスの中でも目立たない瀬戸くんには、なぜかいつもイケてるギャルの安城さんがいちいちエロく絡んでくる。いつもギリギリでドキドキする思春期ぴちぴちラブコメディ！
description.ru: Сето - серьёзный старшеклассник, который вел тихую школьную жизнь, пока не стал жертвой дразнилок гяру Андзё-сан.
description.pt-br:
Seto é um estudante completamente comum e um tanto chato. Mesmo assim, por alguma razão, sua nada correta colega de classe Gal Anjou simplesmente não o deixa em paz!

O Seto sério e a enérgica Anjou formam uma dupla um tanto interessante, mas Anjou não parece se importar, pois se diverte muito provocando-o. Por outro lado, Seto tem dificuldade em lidar com todas as suas travessuras intermináveis; mal ele percebe que suas reações humorísticas são precisamente o motivo pelo qual Anjou gosta de sua companhia.

Mas… quanto de seu flerte é meramente uma atuação?

title.en: Tensei Shitara Akari dake ga Slime Datta Ken

altTitles.ja: 転生したらあかりだけスライムだった件

altTitles.en: That Time Only Akari Got Reincarnated as a Slime

description.en: The Amusement Club gets transported to another world... and Akari turns into a slime. A new Yuru Yuri isekai spinoff.
description.ja: 三輪車により現実味のない世界にきた4人の女子中学生。制服はそのまま、友達もいる。でも……一人だけ様子がおかしい！　行く宛もないし、お金もない。困ったけど……うーん、まぁ! なんとかなるでしょ!

title.en: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w

altTitles.ja: FPSで初心者ボコってリアルファイトに発展した結果w

altTitles.en: After Beating a Noob in an FPS, He Wanted to Fight Me in Real Life LOL

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Bị Tôi Bón Hành Trong Game, Có Đứa Hẹn Kèo Đánh Tôi!

altTitles.id: Hasil dari Mengalahkan seorang Pemula di FPS yang Berkembang Menjadi Pertarungan di RL haha

altTitles.ro: Luptând Cu Un Începător La Jocurile FPS

altTitles.es-la: Después de vencer a un novato en un FPS, ¡Quería pelear conmigo en la vida real jaja!

description.en:
After I beat a noob in an FPS, he challenged me to a fight in real life!?

I decided to go along with it just for fun, but when I got there, a cute girl was waiting for me!

This is a romcom featuring a scummy male lead and a feisty female lead!

(Source: [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/1564434/vol_no/001))
description.ja:
FPSで初心者をボコったらリアルファイトに誘われた！？
面白半分で行ってみるとそこにいたのは可愛い女の子！
クズ系主人公と、闘志マンマンのヒロインによる
ラブコメディ！？
未公開の前日章「とある1日」も追加しています！
